name: Blind Bacon
description:
Blind Bacon - a target practice game with a twist

A homage to the flash game "CURSOR INVISIBLE (c) Dec 2004 Amo's JUNK=LIFE / BGM by oo39.com"

Fixed windowed resolution: 1280 x960

The cursor disappears after the first hit.

Try to survive for as long as possible.

Two game modes.

Classic mode:

    Spawn up to 5 targets at 250 millisecond interval.

    Targets start to get smaller and vanish the longer they're alive.

Steroids mode:

    Spawns up to 3 targets at 170 ms interval.

    The player has a maximum of 1000 ms to live.

    Each kill replenishes time to live by 225 ms.
